ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 37
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a quoted 25% increase hutning in dungeons. Later Chris ... From: Joel Thronburg  To: EQCheats@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
There is a quoted 25% increase hutning in dungeons.

Later
Chris

-----Original Message-----
From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com' <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 01, 1999 6:44 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 37


>From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>
>It is most likely a myth that started when someone noticed they got more
>XP in a large group. They probably associated the increased gain with a
>game feature(ie: a 25% bonus) rather than what was really
>happening--killing tougher mobs or regular mobs at a faster pace.
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Doug Sorensen [SMTP:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
>> Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 1:36 PM
>> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 37
>>
>> From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>>
>>
>> I mentioned the experience bonus with a group and one
>> of the members said he asked 5 GMs and that the bonus
>> doesn't exist.
>>
>> Belgarth Wolfstrider
>>
>> --- Mikaela <mikaela@...> wrote:
>> > From: "Mikaela" <mikaela@...>
>> >
>> > I have heard of this bonus as well, but have never
>> > seen it posted anywhere
>> > and from personal experience, have seen a greater
>> > gain in the dungeons I
>> > hunt in with only 3 players as opposed to 6. Where
>> > officially is/was this
>> > information about the 6-person vs. 3 person bonus?
>>
